name: Register by channel 1
description: Only calculate the transformation for slices in channel=1. Register all other channels according to this alignment.

name: Register to last frame of channel 0
description: Only calculate the alignment for channel 0, with the last frame as reference. For all other Z/C/T slices apply the same transformation.

name: Register to last frame of reference
description: Each slice is registered to its equivalent Z/C position in the reference. Always use the last frame of the reference.
